task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 290°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to estimate the height of the building, but I cannot see its top, so I must first look up to get a full view of the structure.
I have tilted up 30 degrees but still cannot see the top of the building, so I need to look up further to see the roofline.
I have tilted up but still cannot see the top of the building, so I need to continue looking up to find the roofline.
I can now see the top of the building; it appears to be approximately 25 stories high, and assuming each story is about 3.5 meters, the total height would be around 87.5 meters.
